content.yext/answer:
Need help getting started or building your Answers experience? Head over to [Hitchhikers](https://hitchhikers.yext.com/login), our learning and community platform to help make you an expert on Yext. We recommend a few things:

* Check out our 10 Steps to Getting Your Answers Experience Live guide for step\-by\-step walkthrough of the basics
* Earning your Hitchhiker Badge to learn a bit more about the program
* Post in the Community if you have any questions on how things work or best practices

Happy Hitchhiking!
content.yext/name: How can I get help building my Yext Answers experience?
